results.title: Simvastatin intervention mitigates hypercholesterolemia-induced alveolar bone resorption in rats
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ intervention mitigates @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@-induced alveolar @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ in rats

results.title: The role of autophagy in SIM mediated anti-inflammatory osteoclastogenesis through NLRP3 signaling pathway
results.text_hl: The results indicated that the area of the @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@OC@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption pits@@@ was markedly decreased by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ at an appropriate concentration compared with that in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@-free group.

results.title: Simvastatin alleviates bone resorption in apical periodontitis possibly by inhibition of mitophagy-related osteoblast apoptosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ alleviates @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ in @DISEASE_Periapical_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010485 @@@apical periodontitis@@@ possibly by inhibition of mitophagy-related osteoblast apoptosis.

results.title: Biodegradable polymerized simvastatin stimulates bone formation.
results.text_hl: Significant new bone growth at the circumference of poly(ethylene glycol)-block-poly(simvastatin) disks was observed beginning at 4 weeks, whereas severe @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ (4 weeks) and @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone loss@@@ (8 weeks) were observed for @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@ loaded with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Venkatesan N, Liyanage ADT, Castro-Núñez J, Asafo-Adjei T, Cunningham LL, Dziubla TD, Puleo DA. Biodegradable polymerized simvastatin stimulates bone formation. Acta Biomater. 2019 Jul 15;93():192-199. PMID: 31055123

results.title: Topical administration of simvastatin recovers alveolar bone loss in rats.
results.text_hl: Microcomputed tomography images revealed that treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ recovered the ligature-induced @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@alveolar bone resorption@@@, showing a 46% reversal of bone height.

citations.NLM: Seto H, Ohba H, Tokunaga K, Hama H, Horibe M, Nagata T. Topical administration of simvastatin recovers alveolar bone loss in rats. J Periodontal Res. 2008 Jun;43(3):261-7. PMID: 18447852

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits osteoclast differentiation induced by bone morphogenetic protein-2 and RANKL through regulating MAPK, AKT and Src signaling.
results.text_hl: In contrast @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ alone had no effects on the @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@osteoclastic@@@ markers in @CELLLINE_CVCL:2H99 @@@MLC-6@@@ cells.

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits osteoclast differentiation by scavenging reactive oxygen species.
results.text_hl: This indicates that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has potential usefulness for @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@pathological bone resorption@@@.

results.title: Protective mechanisms of simvastatin in experimental periodontal disease.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The present data suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ prevents @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ in experimental @DISEASE_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@, which may be mediated by its anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and antioxidant properties.

citations.NLM: Dalcico R, de Menezes AM, Deocleciano OB, Oriá RB, Vale ML, Ribeiro RA, Brito GA. Protective mechanisms of simvastatin in experimental periodontal disease. J Periodontol. 2013 Aug;84(8):1145-57. PMID: 23181416

results.title: Effect of simvastatin administration on periodontitis-associated bone loss in ovariectomized rats.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on ligature-induced @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ in the mandible of the ovariectomized @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin suppresses osteoblastic expression of Cyr61 and progression of apical periodontitis through enhancement of the transcription factor Forkhead/winged helix box protein O3a.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @DISEASE_Periapical_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D010483 @@@periapical lesions@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@, reduced osteoblastic expressions of @GENE_CCN1 @GENE_83476 @@@Cyr61@@@, p-@GENE_FOXO3 @GENE_294515 @@@FoxO3a@@@, and @GENE_CCL2 @GENE_24770 @@@CCL2@@@, and suppressed macrophage recruitment.
